::DrillBit::

DrillBit was about to defend himself to KitKat, when he thought better
of it. He thought Megatron was a good leader, but had been foolish
lately. Thats why he joined the group in the first place, to take over.
Although his love for KitKat was putting that dream on the back burner.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod pointed a rocket launcher at the prissoner.
"So, who is he?" He said again.
